title: „Der Konflikt wird sich dauerhaft etablieren“
cleaned_sentences: In April one of the most internationally renowned factories on Russia opened its new headquarters in April: Carnegie Russia Eurasia Center.
The center under the roof of the American Carnegie Foundation for International Peace was originally native to Moscow and was closed by the Russian government in 2022.
Carnegie Moscow had been closely accompanied by the various phases of the post -communist Russia since it was founded in 1994.
The focus was always on explaining Russia of the non-Russian world-and vice versa.
The Moscow center pursued a policy of consistent localization; No foreigners have been working there since 2010.
The head of the center residing on Pariser Platz is Alexander Gabujew, born in 1985.
In conversation with the Berliner Zeitung, he gives an insight into the challenges of the new situation.
